Title: Crank
Actors: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Jose Pablo Cantillo, Efren Ramirez
Plot: When the hit-man Chev Chelios is poisoned by the criminal Verona, his friend and doctor Miles advises him that he must keep his adrenaline levels elevated to stay alive. Chev meets his girlfriend Eve and together they look for Verona to kill him.
Production: Lakeshore Entertainment, Radical Media, Lionsgate Films
